text: Andrew Crowley Gilpin (September 30, 1920 - March 1, 2014) was a Canadian ice hockey forward. Born in Montreal, Quebec, he was a member of the Ottawa RCAF Flyers who won the gold medal in ice hockey for Canada at the 1948 Winter Olympics in St. Moritz. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey forwards Category:Olympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Andy Gilpin
